Function Documentation

function hexgrid ( in  phobj,
in  x0,
in  y0,
in  sizeX,
in  sizeY,
in  d,
in  D,
in  ang1,
in  ang2 
)

Hexgrid generates list of nodes of hexagonal grid.

Parameters:
x0 x position of grid center, (x,0) - center of image
y0 y position of grid center, (0,y) - center of image
sizeX x side size of image [mm]
sizeY y side size of image [mm]
d diameter of (node) circle
D node size
ang1 grid rotation
ang2 not for use, should be 0
Return values:
X,Y cartesian coordinates of nodes
W,H node width and height (= diameter of circle)
A,R polar coordinates of nodes
